1 John__05.1:
Whosoever believeth that Jesus is the Christ,<u>
                is born of God
               </u>. And every one that loveth him who begot, loveth him also who is born of him.
1 John__05.2: In this we know that we love the children of God: when we love God, and keep his commandments.
1 John__05.3: For this is the charity of God, that we keep his commandments: and his commandments are not heavy.
1 John__05.4:
For whatsoever is born of God, overcometh the world: and this is the victory which overcometh the world,<u>
                our faith
               </u>.
1 John__05.5: Who is he that overcometh the world, but he that believeth that Jesus is the Son of God?
1 John__05.6:
This is he that<u>
                came by water and blood
               </u>, Jesus Christ: not by water only, but by water and blood. And it is the Spirit which testifieth, that Christ is the truth.
1 John__05.7: And there are three who give testimony in heaven, the Father, the Word, and the Holy Ghost. And these three are one.
1 John__05.8:
And there are three that give testimony on earth:<u>
                the spirit, and the water, and the blood
               </u>: and these three are one.
1 John__05.9: If we receive the testimony of men, the testimony of God is greater. For this is the testimony of God, which is greater, because he hath testified of his Son.
1 John__05.10:
He that believeth in the Son of God, hath the testimony of God in himself.<u>
                He that believeth not the Son
               </u>, maketh him a liar: because he believeth not in the testimony which God hath testified of his Son.
1 John__05.11: And this is the testimony, that God hath given to us eternal life. And this life is in his Son.
1 John__05.12: He that hath the Son, hath life. He that hath not the Son, hath not life.
1 John__05.13: These things I write to you, that you may know that you have eternal life, you who believe in the name of the Son of God.
1 John__05.14: And this is the confidence which we have towards him: That, whatsoever we shall ask according to his will, he heareth us.
1 John__05.15: And we know that he heareth us whatsoever we ask: we know that we have the petitions which we request of him.
1 John__05.16:
He that knoweth his brother to sin<u>
                a sin which is not to death
               </u>, let him ask, and life shall be given to him, who sinneth not to death. There is<u>
                a sin unto death
               </u>: for that I say not that any man ask.
1 John__05.17: All iniquity is sin. And there is a sin unto death.
1 John__05.18: We know that whosoever is born of God, sinneth not: but the generation of God preserveth him, and the wicked one toucheth him not.
1 John__05.19:
We know that we are of God, and<u>
                the whole world is seated in wickedness
               </u>.
1 John__05.20:
And we know that the Son of God is come: and he hath given us understanding that we may know the true God,<u>
                and may be in his true Son
               </u>. This is the true God and life eternal.
1 John__05.21:
Little children,<u>
                keep yourselves from idols
               </u>. Amen.
